title: ACCESS FILES: JakdragonX
content:

[[module CSS]]

}

[[module CSS]]
@import url('http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/turbo-vision/IBM_VGA8.css');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono&display=swap');

.turbo-container .blockbase {
width: 100%;
   box-sizing: border-box;
   border-radius: 0;
   border-width: 16px; border-style: solid; padding: 0; border-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:turbo-vision/border_white2.svg) 16 round;
   background-color: black;
   box-shadow: none;
   padding: 4px;
   color: white; 
   font-family: "IBM Plex Mono", sans-serif;
   font-size: 16px;
   margin-bottom: 1em;
}

.turbo-container .blockbasetitle {
    background-color: inherit;
    padding-left:1rem;
    padding-right: 1rem;
    width: 285px;
    margin: auto;
    font-size: 24px;
    font-family: pxplus_ibm_vga8regular, monospace;
    z-index: 2;
    margin-top: -40px;
    margin-bottom: -20px;
}

.turbo-container { font-family: "IBM Plex Mono", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22px; color: white; }
.turbo-container h1, .turbo-container h2, .turbo-container h3, .turbo-container h4, .turbo-container h5, .turbo-container h6 { font-family: pxplus_ibm_vga8regular,monospace; }
.turbo-container h1 { color: #FF3535 }
.turbo-container p { line-height: 22px; }
.turbo-container strong, .turbo-container b { font-weight: normal; }
.turbo-container em, .turbo-container i { font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; }
.turbo-container a { color: #FF3535; }
.turbo-container a:hover { text-decoration: none; background-color: white; }
 
.turbo-container .image {position: relative; z-index: 1; }
.turbo-container .scp-image-block { position: relative; background: #aaa; border-radius: 0; border-width: 16px; border-style: solid; padding: 0; border-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:turbo-vision/border_white.svg) 16 round; margin: 1em -1.5em 1em 1em; box-shadow: none; }
.turbo-container .scp-image-caption { background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; border: none; }
.turbo-container .scp-image-block::after { content: "IMAGE"; position: absolute; top: -1em; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,0); color: white; padding: 0 8px; background: #aaa; }
.turbo-container .image.red .scp-image-block,
.turbo-container .image.red .scp-image-block::after { background: #4c0000; }
 
.turbo-container .block { position: relative; border-radius: 0; border-width: 16px; border-style: solid; padding: 0; border-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:turbo-vision/border_white2.svg) 16 round; box-shadow: none; margin-bottom: 2em; }
.turbo-container .block .heading { font-size: 100%; border: none; padding: 0; margin: 1em 0 0 -11px; width: calc(100% + 22px); background: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/turbo-vision/line_white2.png); background-repeat: repeat-x; max-width: none; }
.turbo-container .block .heading p { display: inline-block; padding: 0 8px; background-color: inherit; margin: 0; margin-left: 2em; color: white; font-weight: normal; }
.turbo-container .block::after { content: attr(data-title); position: absolute; top: -1em; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,0); color: white; padding: 0 8px; }
.turbo-container .block.quote,
.turbo-container .block.quote::after,
.turbo-container .block.quote .heading p { background: #b0b0b0!important;}
.turbo-container .block.black,
.turbo-container .block.black::after,
.turbo-container .block.black .heading p { background:#000;}
.turbo-container .block.grey,
.turbo-container .block.grey::after,
.turbo-container .block.grey .heading p { background: #1C1C1C; }
.turbo-container .block.lred,
.turbo-container .block.lred::after,
.turbo-container .block.lred .heading p { background: #4c0000; }
.turbo-container .block.pink,
.turbo-container .block.pink::after,
.turbo-container .block.pink .heading p { background: pink; }
.turbo-container .block.black-border { https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:turbo-vision/border_black2.svg) 16 round; }
.turbo-container .block.black-border .heading { background: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:turbo-vision/border_black2.svg); }
.turbo-container .block.black-border .heading p { color: black; }
.turbo-container .block.black-border::after { color: black; }
.turbo-container .block.quote-border { border-image: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/turbo-vision/border_white.png) 16 round; }
.turbo-container .block.quote-border .heading { background: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:turbo-vision/border_black2.svg); }
.turbo-container .block.quote-border .heading p { color: #c2c2c2; }
.turbo-container .block.quote-border::after { color: #c2c2c2; }
 
.turbo-container .scp-image-block::before, .turbo-container .block::before { content: ""; position: absolute; height: calc(100% + 2em); width: calc(100% + 2em); z-index: -1; }
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> Greetings.
> ~~~~~
> If you are viewing this message, that means you have been selected to perform in a controlled experiment. Your internet traffic will be monitored, as well as your physical and mental wellbeing. This test involves the development of a new A.I. that was created by Dr. Reigen. By attempting to access Dr. Reigen's Personnel Files, you have willfully chosen to participate in this test. You will not be harmed. Whenever you are ready, please connect to the virtual terminal.
> ~~~~~
> Keep in mind, you may also exit your current web browser if you do not wish to participate. This is ill-advised. Thank you again, user.

[[cell]]
[[include :topia:listusers-1 users="."]]
[[user %%name%%]], right?

...

[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
[[include :topia:listusers-1 users="."]]
"Oh, yes! That's my name, [[user %%name%%]]!"
[[include :topia:listusers-2]]
"Oh, yes! I'm a Guest!"
[[include :topia:listusers-3]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/HAPPYTATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
Wonderful! Nice to meet you, and thank you for allowing us your time in order to experiment!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
"What's your name, oh great and fancy AI?"
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
Aw, shucks! You're too much :) If you must know I am--
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
I...
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/MADTATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
...
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
I am
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/GLITCHEDTATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
##FF3535|GhafgASFiohaFUz--##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block grey" data-title="SYSTEM MESSAGE: admin"]]
{{**SYSTEM:** .AIC PURGED. Refreshing client and attempting data recovery...}}

**admin:** EPIONE.aic is a bit buggy. Expect minor issues. It's why you're here.
[[/div]]

[[div class="block grey" data-title="SYSTEM MESSAGE: admin"]]
{{**SYSTEM:** .AIC recovered. Loading back into session....}}
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
Why, hello! Sorry about that.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
Anyway, today, you've been tasked with helping me learn! To do this, Dr. Reigen has offered to allow me complete access to his Personnel File. However, due to the restrictions I currently have set in place, I've had to slightly edit the file in order to accommodate for our little experiment. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/HAPPYTATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
(He won't mind.)
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
Ready to begin? If so, scroll down to the series of commands I've placed for you. They should allow you to see everything you need about Dr. Reigen. I'll be here as your lovely assistant throughout the process :)
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
(Remember, I still am trying to learn after all!)
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="block grey" data-title="REIGEN'S FILES"]]
[[=]]
+ WELCOME
@@ @@
++ PROPERTY OF: THE SCP FOUNDATION
++ ##FF3535|SECURE. CONTAIN. PROTECT.##
@@ @@
[[size 125%]] You are currently accessing Dr. Reigen's (ScIP.net username [[*user JakdragonX]]) Personnel File. Please, enjoy your time.[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
What would you like to access first?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=> access SCP Articles
| hide=> close SCP Articles
]]
Please access any of the following SCP Articles by clicking below.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=access SCP-4983
| hide=close SCP-4983
]]

[[=]]
[[size 115%]][[[/scp-4983|SCP-4983 - Welcome to Hales]]][[/size]]
~~~~~~
**By:** JakdragonX
~~~~~~
{{"SCP-4983's anomalous properties manifest randomly and inexplicably. Reports of an unknown rhythmic sound, alongside sightings of "ghosts" and other related phenomena from within the premises, have been recorded from both Foundation personnel and nearby Hales residents."}}
[[/=]]

[[div class="block lred" data-title="COMMENTARY"]]

This used to be my very first article, but since then it has been rewritten into something that more fits my style of writing. I'm quite happy with it! It's not the most astonishing thing in the world but I don't think it's "bad" by any metrics. I do wish it would be read more, though.

[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
Ooh, a spooky story! Perhaps taking some inspiration from [[[SCP-6274]]]?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=access SCP-5018
| hide=close SCP-5018
]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]][[[/scp-5018|SCP-5018 - The Broken Rose]]][[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{"The Foundation sees itself as a rose among a field of weeds."}}
~~~~~
**By:** JakdragonX, IronDruid
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[div class="block lred" data-title="COMMENTARY"]]

This was my entry into 5kon. It's pretty garbage, but still somehow over +100.

[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
He doesn't seem to fond of this one. How strange!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=access SCP-5150
| hide=close SCP-5150
]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]][[[/scp-5150|SCP-5150 - Anomalous Dental Office]]][[/size]]
~~~~~~
**By:** JakdragonX
~~~~~~
{{"Once all of their excess teeth are removed and stored within the infirmary's storage room, personnel are to be evaluated and debriefed before being administered Class C amnestics."}}
[[/=]]

[[div class="block lred" data-title="COMMENTARY"]]

After a trip to the Dentist's office nearly went wrong, I developed this little scary concept as a coping mechanism. It's basically an excuse to try and write horror, and that obviously shows. Need to do some work on it.

[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/MADTATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
##FF3535|Teeth are absolutely disgusting.##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=access SCP-5850
| hide=close SCP-5850
]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]][[[/scp-5850|SCP-5850 - A Train to Hell]]][[/size]]
~~~~~~
**By:** JakdragonX
~~~~~~
{{"SCP-5850 is a passenger locomotive currently in-transit within the United States and has never been observed to stop or decelerate under any circumstances."}}
[[/=]]

[[div class="block lred" data-title="COMMENTARY"]]

I was inspired to write this after a terrible tragedy that happened not too far away. I was still rusty with emotional writing, which you can tell if you read this carefully. Still, it was also my first article to ever get a reading on YouTube. I'm still not as proud of this as I used to be.

[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
According to several users, this anomaly has also been considered as the "GTAV Train." Whatever that means, I'm not entirely sure.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=access SCP-5343
| hide=close SCP-5343
]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]][[[/scp-5343|SCP-5343 - The "For-You News" App!]]][[/size]]
~~~~~~
**By:** JakdragonX
~~~~~~
{{"Although media presented on SCP-5343 varies, information within these publications can directly or indirectly affect the subjects operating the application."}}
[[/=]]

[[div class="block lred" data-title="COMMENTARY"]]

This idea popped into my head during a car ride with my parents. I'm happy to say that this was one of my prouder works on the site, although admittedly there's still a lot I could've improved. Overall, this was something I really enjoyed writing.

[[/div]]

[[div class="block black" style="color: white;"]]
[[table]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="min-width: 100px;"]]
[[image http://kaktuskontainer.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma%3Acomplete-jakdragonx-author-page/TATTLETALE.png style="width: 100px;" alt="EPIONE.aic Sprite"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell]]
"Westhead Media" a minor GoI to the Foundation, is also featured in this article. If I'm not mistaken, that is.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=access SCP-5963
| hide=close SCP-5963
]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]][[[/scp-5963|SCP-5963 - Dark Nights at ShowBiz Pizza Place]]][[/size]]
~~~~~~
**By:** JakdragonX, [[[/karas-corner-of-doom|Karablue9482]]]
~~~~~~
